channel.title: 2 Worlds 718 PrometheusEconomy && 667 PrometheusPk || Hiscores,Vote4items,AutoDo
channel.description:
[img]http://prometheus718rsps.com/forums/images/dark1.8/darklogo.png[/img] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5xn7lSV7HAI
On Prometheus's forums and the server. It is important to respect each other, and always strive to be a better person than you may be, or already are. If you respect the other members, the other staff, and the rules you will help in our goal of becoming not just a server but a community. ​We offer you the most mature and professional staff and constant updates that the players want. Here is a list of some of our features, I will show some pictures towards the end of this thread.
-Prestiging. -All Correct Bonuses on the many different armours. -DAILY updates. -Hp Bonuses from Nex Armours. -Curse Prayers. -Perfect switching. -All Spirit Shields. -Unique Custom Content. -Money pouch. -Squeal Of Fortune. -Stable Economy. -Completionist Cape.
-Corpereal Beast. -King Black Dragon. -Dagganoth Kings. -Kalphite Queen. -Bandos. -Saradomin. -Bork. -Queen Black Dragon. -Nex. -Blink.
-Fight Caves. -Fight Kiln. -Fight Pits.
[SPOILER=Click]
[/SPOILER]
Still have a lot of pictures to add those are just ones I've taken. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AE-H_Xo0ots https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OVpIO6WY-0g
Of course we have a lot more features. You can check all features out by logging in now! Links below. [url=http://prometheus718rsps.com/]Home[/url] [url=http://prometheus718rsps.com/forums]Forums[/url]
2nd World added "PrometheusPk"
